channel.title: LyonHacks on MCPT Learning Resources
channel.description: Recent content in LyonHacks on MCPT Learning Resources

item.title: Season I
item.description: This event ended on April 15th, 2021. LyonHacks is a hackathon at William Lyon Mackenzie C.I., geared towards creativity, learning, and having as much fun as possible with the various mini-games, challenges, and social events that will take place during the hackathon! Join us for 36 hours of hacking between April 13-15th, and make sure you’ve registered through https://mcpt.ca/lyonhacks Winners The winners of the LyonHacks event can be found here!

item.title: Season II
